item.description: The original name of this class is pain and stress management. There will be an education of many techniques for reducing pain and stress but we will also unveil a new revolutionary pain relief product. This product uses holographic technology to match your body's frequency. In early August the HSC Center began doing a beta test on the product. The results are astounding. I myself have used the product and have been amazed. Please invite friends and family with pain issues to this meeting. This product is non transdermal and has NO side effects. Every person signed up in advance will receive a free sample that night with clear instruction on usage and prices. Clients trying the product have had great results, not just small results! Some clients have gone from a pain level of a 9 down to a 2 in less than 10 minutes. If you are attending that night and plan on trying the product please come hydrated and ready to learn! Space is limited to 70. Please call today and sign up. You will not only be happy you did it WILL change the way you look at pain for the rest of your life. This is amazing stuff!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Vibration Medicine Uses to Remove Pain and Stress
